channel.title: Downstream Jobs on Packit Service Status

item.title: [Resolved] Fedora Anubis
item.description: Packit downstream jobs may not work as expected due to the new Anubis rules deployed in Fedora Infrastructure. For example, sometimes Packit gets back an HTML page with the Anubis disclaimer instead of the specfile or the packit yaml config. Waiting and retriggering a job could work around the issue.
item.content: Packit downstream jobs may not work as expected due to the new Anubis rules deployed in Fedora Infrastructure. For example, sometimes Packit gets back an HTML page with the Anubis disclaimer instead of the specfile or the packit yaml config. Waiting and retriggering a job could work around the issue.
